content.text: Match ends, Almería 1, Las Palmas 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 1, Las Palmas 1.

Goal!  Almería 1, Las Palmas 1. Víctor Laguardia (Las Palmas) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonathan Viera following a set piece situation.
Mauro Quiroga (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Santiago Acasiete (Almería).
Substitution, Almería. Santiago Acasiete replaces Fernando Soriano.
Attempt missed. Jonathan Viera (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Mauro Quiroga.
Foul by Mauro Quiroga (Las Palmas).
Michael Jakobsen (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Michael Jakobsen.
Attempt blocked. Jonathan Viera (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Almería. Rafita replaces Aleix Vidal.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Víctor Laguardia.
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Esteban.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Mauro Quiroga replaces Vicente Gómez.
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Corona.
Attempt blocked. Javier Portillo (Las Palmas) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Vitolo.
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Aleix Vidal with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Jonathan Viera (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Vitolo.
Attempt missed. Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Corona with a cross following a set piece situation.
Stephane Pignol (Las Palmas) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Omar Ramos (Almería) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Attempt saved. Jonathan Viera (Las Palmas) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergio Suárez.
Attempt missed. Javier Portillo (Las Palmas) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jonathan Viera.
Substitution, Almería. Omar Ramos replaces Aarón Ñíguez.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Sergio Suárez replaces Roque Mesa.
Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernando Soriano (Almería).
Corner,  Las Palmas. Conceded by Fernando Soriano.
Attempt blocked. Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Javier Portillo (Las Palmas) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Vitolo with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Javier Portillo replaces Randy.

Vicente Gómez (Las Palmas) hits the left post with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Randy.
Goal!  Almería 1, Las Palmas 0. Aleix Vidal (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Bautista with a cross.
Leonardo Ulloa (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
